      • get

        public static byte[] get(java.lang.String url)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Load the given url and return the byte array readed
        参数:
        url - The url to load
        返回:
        Byte array data readed from the stream
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.Exception
